hero.overline: Clinical AI | Data Science | Medical Imaging
hero.subtitle: Building healthcare AI systems that are clinically grounded, measurable, and deployable in real workflows.

educationLines: B.S. Data Science, Minor in Business
paragraphs: I am a Data Science student at the University of Michigan working at the intersection of machine learning, clinical medicine, and healthcare operations.
My current research focuses on small-model LLM fine-tuning for clinical information extraction and survival modeling in bladder cancer, alongside broader medical imaging and multimodal AI work.
I also lead educational and technology initiatives through the Michigan Data Science Team and Blueprints for Pangaea, where I build systems that move from prototype to day-to-day use.
about.quote: The best healthcare AI is clinically useful, operationally practical, and rigorously measured.

experience.description: Fine-tuning clinical LLMs and integrating multimodal data for bladder-cancer extraction and five-year survival modeling research.
Built ML and generative AI workflows for billing compliance and coding-risk analysis at scale across large primary-care revenue streams.
Contributed to peer-reviewed diversity research and LLM-assisted systematic review workflows in clinical research settings.
Conducted wet-lab and analysis work on sleep and memory consolidation models, including data collection and experimental support.
Built Python-based GenAI automation and ETL workflows for high-precision data collection and lead intelligence pipelines.
Managed media/data operations and VBA-supported processing workflows for health content and platform datasets.

leadership.description: Lead onboarding and education initiatives, including technical workshops on Python, Git, and data visualization.
Built the inaugural technology function, defining product direction, SOPs, and rollout strategy across chapter operations.

leadership.role: Project Lead, Breast Cancer Classification (Dec 2024 - Apr 2025)
leadership.description: Led a 10+ person team building subtype-aware vision models on BreakHis, improving baseline performance by +23.7%.

contact.heading: Let's Build Something Together
contact.subtitle: For research collaborations, healthcare AI projects, or technical consulting, reach out directly.
